name: Into Darkness (MomoLala23)
description:
One day, as Blop was playing outside with some friends, something terrible happened!

Blop was sucked down to the earth, and faced with a scary dungeon he must escape, and monsters to defeat.

Join him in his quest to get back outside and defeat the spooky red Plobs!

Can you beat all 3 worlds: Light, Dark and Pitch Black?

-------------------------------------

The game was made during the weekly game jam (week 144). Every asset, resource and script was created during that week by me.

This is my first game jam, and I'd love to hear some feedback and criticism about my game!
